targets.query:
from(bucket: "order")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "progress"and r._field =~ /name|failed_job_steps/ )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "${var_orders}")
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time",
   failed_job_steps as failed
FROM processing_order_mon_order_progress
INNER JOIN processing_order on processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = processing_order.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') AND 
  processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = (SELECT id FROM processing_order WHERE identifier = '${var_processing_order}')
ORDER BY datetime

panels.title: ${var_processing_order} (selected processing order: Failed + Completed = Finished Job Steps)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "order")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "progress"and r._field =~ /name|all_job_steps/ )
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "${var_orders}")
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time",
   all_job_steps
FROM processing_order_mon_order_progress
INNER JOIN processing_order on processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = processing_order.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') AND 
  processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = (SELECT id FROM processing_order WHERE identifier = '${var_processing_order}')
ORDER BY datetime

targets.query:
FinalOutput = ["Order", "Time" "All", "Completed", "Failed", "Finished", "Running"]

RawSeries = from(bucket: "order")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "progress"and r._field =~ /name|all_job_steps|finished_job_steps|completed_job_steps|failed_job_steps|running_job_steps/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "${var_orders}")

NamedSeries = RawSeries
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Order":r.name, "Time":r._time, "All":r.all_job_steps, "Completed":r.completed_job_steps, 
          "Failed":r.failed_job_steps, "Finished": r.finished_job_steps, "Running":r.running_job_steps}))
    |> keep(columns:FinalOutput)
    
NamedSeries |> yield()
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  processing_order.identifier AS order_identifier, 
  mon_order_state.name AS state, 
  all_job_steps AS all, 
  failed_job_steps AS failed, 
  finished_job_steps AS finished, 
  completed_job_steps AS completed, 
  running_job_steps AS running, 
  processing_order_mon_order_progress.datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time"
FROM processing_order_mon_order_progress
INNER JOIN processing_order on processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = processing_order.id
INNER JOIN mon_order_state on processing_order_mon_order_progress.mon_order_state_id = mon_order_state.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(processing_order_mon_order_progress.datetime at TIME zone 'UTC') AND 
  processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = (SELECT id FROM processing_order WHERE identifier = '${var_processing_order}')
ORDER BY datetime

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "progress"and r._field =~ /name|all_job_steps|finished_job_steps|completed_job_steps|failed_job_steps|running_job_steps/)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  processing_order.identifier AS order_identifier, 
  mon_order_state.name AS state, 
  all_job_steps AS all, 
  failed_job_steps AS failed, 
  finished_job_steps AS finished, 
  completed_job_steps AS completed, 
  running_job_steps AS running, 
  datetime at TIME zone 'UTC' AS "time"
FROM processing_order_mon_order_progress
INNER JOIN processing_order on processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = processing_order.id
INNER JOIN mon_order_state on processing_order_mon_order_progress.mon_order_state_id = mon_order_state.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime at TIME zone 'UTC')  
ORDER BY datetime

list.definition:
SELECT processing_order.identifier
FROM processing_order_mon_order_progress
INNER JOIN processing_order on processing_order_mon_order_progress.processing_order_id = processing_order.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(processing_order_mon_order_progress.datetime  at TIME zone 'UTC')
GROUP BY 1;
list.label: Processing Orders
list.name: var_processing_order
